Detailed Description

A very simple physics engine.

YOU CAN ONLY USE BOUNDING BOXES!!!

This will be (maybe) removed from Nitro Engine in the future...

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum NE_OnCollition

Possible actions that can be applied to an object after a collition.

Enumerator:
NE_ColNothing  Ignore the object.
NE_ColBounce  Bounce against the object.
NE_ColStop  Stop.

enum NE_PhysicsTypes

Object types used in physics engine.

Enumerator:
NE_BoundingBox  Bounding box.
NE_BoundingSphere  Bounding sphere.
NE_Dot  Use this with really small objects.

Function Documentation

bool NE_PhysicsCheckCollition ( NE_Physics *  pointer1,
NE_Physics *  pointer2 
)

Returns true if given objects are colliding without checking physics groups.

Parameters:
pointer1 Pointer to first object.
pointer2 Pointer to second object.

NE_Physics* NE_PhysicsCreate ( NE_PhysicsTypes  type  ) 

Creates a physics object of given type.

Parameters:
type Object type.

void NE_PhysicsDelete ( NE_Physics *  pointer  ) 

Deletes a physics object.

Parameters:
pointer Pointer to the object.

void NE_PhysicsEnable ( NE_Physics *  pointer,
bool  value 
) [inline]

Enable movement for a physics object.

Parameters:
pointer Pointer to the physics object.
value True enables physics, false disables it.
If false, it won't update anything of this object. Use this to save some time if given object is, for example, the floor.

bool NE_PhysicsIsColliding ( NE_Physics *  pointer  )  [inline]

Returns true if given object was colliding with other object last time it updated.

Parameters:
pointer Pointer to the object.
This doesn't work with disabled objects.

void NE_PhysicsOnCollition ( NE_Physics *  physics,
NE_OnCollition  action 
) [inline]

Set action to do if collition.

Parameters:
physics Pointer to the object.
action Action.

void NE_PhysicsSetGroup ( NE_Physics *  physics,
int  group 
) [inline]

Sets phisics group of an object.

Parameters:
physics Pointer to the object.
group New physics group.
NOTE: Collitions do only work between objects with the same group.

void *  modelpointer 
) [inline]

void NE_PhysicsSystemReset ( int  number_of_objects  ) 

Resets the physics engine and sets the maximun number of objects.

Parameters:
number_of_objects Number of objects. If it is less than 1, it will create space for NE_DEFAULT_PHYSICS.

void NE_PhysicsUpdate ( NE_Physics *  pointer  ) 

Updates given physics object.

Parameters:
pointer Pointer to the object.
